name: Spartan (itch)
description:
A video slot game with an ancient Greek theme. Takes you back to Sparta.

You bet up to 9 lines in a 5 reeler. The game supports a progressive Jackpot, Free Bonus with a special "Feature" symbol and the Temple Bonus. And don't forget all winnings can be gambled at the end of the spin.

The SCATTER symbol (a.k.a. helmet) also triggers the FREE SPINS bonus. At the beginning of the bonus randomly a symbol is selected as a "feature" symbol with special characteristics inside the bonus.

The WARRIORS symbol activates the Temple Bonus. You will enter an ancient temple defended by Spartans. Start selecting warriors to earn credits.

The "coin" symbol triggers the JACKPOT.

Credits can be inserted by tapping the CREDITS or amount area and by tapping the "Logo" area you pay the credits. Of course we are talking about fake money.
